DOC.brief_title: Reducing Need In-Clinic Follow-Up Medical Abortion Moldova Uzbekistan
DOC.detailed_description: Medical abortion use mifepristone misoprostol highly effective procedure , access may impede fact woman afford want return follow-up visit . This often result high loss follow-up rate . Additionally , medical abortion woman return follow-up , high cost bear woman healthcare system . This study compare two method follow-up medical abortion : standard care versus alternative follow-up . The former involves routine clinic visit two week misoprostol administration . The latter consist low-sensitivity pregnancy test self-administered questionnaire . Based result test questionnaire , woman may flag need in-clinic follow-up discharge study abortion complete .
